org.bndly.ebx.resources.custom.SearchRes.searchterm.format.ebx.WishList: (WishList_name:*{searchTerm}* OR WishList_email:{searchTerm} OR WishList_email:*{searchTerm}* OR WishList_securityToken:{searchTerm})

org.bndly.rest.swagger.resource.SwaggerR.info.title: eBX Core
org.bndly.rest.swagger.resource.SwaggerR.info.description: This is the eBX Core. It contains various bundles and is accessible via a HATEOAS driven REST API.
